remarks: The meet of distinct atoms is the zero subspace.  ( ~ atnemeq0 analog.) (Contributed by NM, 10-Jan-2015.)
statement:
lsatnem0.o $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` W ) $.
lsatnem0.a $e |- A = ( LSAtoms ` W ) $.
lsatnem0.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LVec ) $.
lsatnem0.q $e |- ( ph -> Q e. A ) $.
lsatnem0.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. A ) $.
lsatnem0 $p |- ( ph -> ( Q =/= R <-> ( Q i^i R ) = { .0. } ) ) $.
